Scenario: A six-way tie with five seats available

OPL
5 seats
12 ballots cast
6 candidates

Pike,D    2 votes
Foster,D  2 votes
Deutsch,R 2 votes
Borg,R    2 votes
Jones,R   2 votes
Smith,I   2 votes

Potential Winner [Pike,D]    -- Any of five these following should be able
Potential Winner [Foster,D]    -- to win the coin flip. The coin flip should
Potential Winner [Deutsch,R]   -- occur five times.
Potential Winner [Borg,R]
Potential Winner [Jones,R]
Potential Winner [Smith,I]

Tie-breaker to break six-way tie is needed here.
